item.title: Submit data with React
item.description: Send data with React This looks like a very simple topic for React aplication. But I met some problems during implementation. The main topic I would like to discuss here is CORS and Form submit. What is CORS It is Cross-Origin Resource Sharing and it is a standard of W3C. It allows browser to send cross-origin requests. The main thing is the server needs to handle CORS interface. There are two types of CORS:
